files.description: Standalone CLI script that builds /outputs/competitive_map.xlsx (or .csv fallback) and /outputs/competitive_summary.md from a curated dataset plus optional user overrides.

Core library module that loads competitor records, normalizes fields (supplier type, pricing bands, warranty, compliance), scores differentiation opportunities, and writes the matrix and markdown summary.
Dataclass and validation helpers defining the competitive record schema and safe defaults for missing/unknown attributes.
Seed dataset of kit suppliers, integrators, and OEM programs with columns for pricing, warranty, compliance posture, and notes used to generate the initial competitive matrix.
Example user override file showing how to add/edit competitors, adjust pricing bands, and annotate compliance and differentiation notes without changing code.
Package initializer exposing the public API for building the competitive landscape deliverables.

missionDescription: Create a competitive landscape matrix deliverable in /outputs: /outputs/competitive_map.xlsx (or .csv) + /outputs/competitive_summary.md covering kit suppliers, integrators, OEM programs, pricing bands, warranty terms, compliance posture, and differentiation opportunities.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
Missing direction identified: competitive mapping; without it, GTM and differentiation cannot be credibly defined.
projectName: competitive landscape matrix deliverable in /outputs: /outputs/competitive_map.xlsx (or .csv) + /outputs/competitive_summary.md covering kit suppliers, integrators, OEM
